D

DisplayMatrix - Class in panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4
DisplayMatrix is a program that prompts the user to input a matrix, and then displays the matrix in various formats, such as by row, by column, backwards, by diagonal, and zigzag.
DisplayMatrix() - Constructor for class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix

I

inputMatrix() - Static method in class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix
The inputMatrix method prompts the user to input the size of the matrix (number of rows and number of columns) and elements of the matrix.

showMatrix() - Static method in class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix
The showMatrix method displays the original matrix entered by the user.
showMatrixByColumn() - Static method in class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix
The showMatrixByColumn method displays the matrix by column.
showMatrixByColumnBackward() - Static method in class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix
The showMatrixByColumnBackward method displays the matrix by column in backwards order.
showMatrixByDiagonalTopLeftBottomRight() - Static method in class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix
The showMatrixByDiagonalTopLeftBottomRight method displays the matrix by diagonal starting from top left corner to bottom right corner.
showMatrixByDiagonalTopRightBottomLeft() - Static method in class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix
The showMatrixByDiagonalTopRightBottomLeft method displays the matrix by diagonal starting from top right corner to bottom left corner.
showMatrixByRow() - Static method in class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix
The showMatrixByRow method displays the matrix by row.
showMatrixByRowBackward() - Static method in class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix
The showMatrixByRowBackward method displays the matrix by row in backwards order.
showMatrixByRowZigzag() - Static method in class panyaprasirtkit.chatchanan.lab4.DisplayMatrix
The showMatrixByRowZigzag method displays the matrix by row in a zigzag pattern.
